title: Drawing, 1878
medium: Charcoal, black and white chalk on gray laid paper
signed: Signed with monogram and dated in black chalk ?, lower left: [monogram] 78
inscribed: Inscribed in black chalk along lower margin on backing board:  Echo Lake Morning
provenance: Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith
creditline: Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith
description: Horizontal view with lake in the foreground, pine trees on the shore on the left, and  mountains covered with growth on the right.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1878.
1878. Charcoal, black and white chalk on gray laid paper. Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith. 1923-41-2.
